duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, schedule, and modify work schedules for alcohol or drug testing, and report the results.
Administer various types of alcohol or drug tests, such as random, pre-employment, post-accident, reasonable suspicion, return-to-duty, and follow-up.
Determine the appropriate offices, technicians, and/or subcontractors for performing tests based on location or other factors.
Handle problem collections including fatal and correctable flaw processing, chain of custody, donor privacy, and avoidance of offensive or inappropriate statements.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED, Breath Alcohol Technician (BAT) and Urine Specimen Collector certification, minimum two (2) years testing and collection experience, valid Driver’s License
